articles.author: Press Trust of India
articles.title: Afghanistan Star Naveen-ul-Haq Burns Internet With His Post After Historic Win Over Australia - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Afghanistan star Naveen-ul-Haq shared a fiery social media post, taking on critics after his team's win over Australia.
articles.content: No longer the 'minnows', Afghanistan pulled off an upset of epic proportions as they shocked Australia by 21 runs in the T20 World Cup 2024. Thanks to Gulbadin Naib's four-wicket haul, Afghanistan nu… [+2264 chars]
